benchmark_details.name: PALM BENCH
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark of compressed large language models on mobile platforms that focuses on evaluating resource efficiency, generative performance, and harmful outputs for compressed models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of large language models on mobile devices, focusing on resource efficiency, power consumption, and harmful outputs.

data.source: Various popular LLMs and existing benchmark datasets such as SQuAD and Natural Questions.
data.annotation: Automatically generated evaluations based on benchmark datasets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by comparing the performance of quantized models against their non-quantized counterparts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance and lower resource usage.
methodology.validation: Automated evaluation from performance metrics collected during benchmarking.

targeted_risks.harm: Evaluates the frequency of hallucinations and toxicity in generated outputs.
